entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 44 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
